text: Places, family!

We're singing
another catchy song
about the state of the world!
Pass!
Come on, Ma, it'll be fun!
Yeah, let's do this!
OK.

(SINGING) For so long,
we've been waiting,
not to be stuck inside.

(SINGING) There has been
so much grief and sorrow.
It's time to turn the tide.

(SINGING) No more
wearing PJs all day!

(SINGING) Dine out,
get yourself a filet!

(SINGING) Live sports
when the crowd goes wild!

(SINGING) At last,
I'll get my hair styled!

(SINGING) No more
dumb doomscrolling.
I'd rather go bowling!

(SINGING) Reunions with
loved ones will be surreal,
but oh, so fun, like--
(SINGING) Can't believe--
(SINGING) It's really you.

BOTH: - I haven't seen
you in a lifetime.

(SINGING) We're
going to go back out.
Take life in a new route.
Throw up our knees and shout--
What?
I'm sorry, I can't hear you!

(SINGING) See movies
on the big screen.
Thank goodness for the vaccine.

(SINGING) I know we
had plans for lockdown.

(SINGING) I tried
to get a six-pack.
Only got four.

(SINGING) Must finish
painting my clown collection!

(SINGING) Don't
sweat the small stuff.
Cut yourself some slack.

(SINGING) No more
stupid video chat.

(SINGING) Rather try
and say hello to a rat.

(SINGING) About time
I get that back massage.

(SINGING) I'll be
chilling with my entourage!

(SINGING) Pets will be happy
when the house is theirs again.

(SINGING) Face-to-face,
we will meet, and probably
stumble when we greet, like--
Let's shake hands?
Or bump hands?
I don't recall how to be social!

(SINGING) We're
going back outside.
Zip down the theme park ride.
Look, Ma, no hands!

(SINGING) Thank those
who saved our lives!
Not stuck at home any more.

It's time to hit
the dance floor.

There's a whole
world to explore!

Going back, going back,
g-g-going back out.

Going back, going back,
g-g-going back out.

Going back, going back,
g-g-going back out.

Going back, going back,
g-g-going back out.

Hey, now that the world is
finally going back to normal,

I no longer need
to wash my hands!

Cricket, you still
have to wash your hands.
Ugh, seriously?
